name: Ask.fm Blue Galaxy
description:
A black and blue version of Ask.fm with a galaxy background included.
Uma versão azul e preta do Ask.fm com um fundo de galáxia incluso.
additional_info:
Version 4.1 (final release):

  • Modified colors of the BlockUser dialogue.

Version 4.0:

  • Fixed notification flyout palette.
  • Changed "follow" flyout colors.

Version 3.5:

  • Fixed buttons.

Version 3.0:

  • Changed like icon.

Version 2.6:

  • Changed some buttons' palette.
  • Added fixed galaxy background.
  • Fixed recent questions' background color.

Version 2.5:

  • Changed side menu's colors.
  • Fixed h1 colors.

Version 2.0:

  • Added a gradient on Ask.fm's menu.
  • Changed recent questions' background color.

Version 1.0:

  • Initial release.
